text: Lo ( real name Carlos Walker ) has now been granted a platform to display his complicated family situation , which includes his TEN ( 10 ) " baby mamas " and 11 ( yes !ELEVEN ) kids .According to a recently released press release , Shawty Lo 's new show has been picked up by Oxygen and is scheduled to air sometime in the Spring of 2013 as a 1-hour special ." Oxygen will give fans an intimate look at unconventional families with larger than life personalities and real emotional stakes , " says Cori Abraham , Senior Vice President of Development , Oxygen Media . " ' All My Babies Mamas ' will be filled with outrageous and authentic over - the - top moments that our young , diverse female audience can tweet and gossip about . "

The series , which comes courtesy of Tony DiSanto and Liz Gateley , " w ill capture the highs and lows of this extreme ' blended family ' that is anything but ordinary , while also showing the drama and the passion behind life 's most unexpected situations . "Shawty Lo 's baby mamas featured on the show include : .Lo , 36 , also has a 19-year - old girlfriend , Ashlin , who will also be featured on the show .Ashlin claims to be madly in love with him and says she met Lo when he already had 10 children ( Sidebar : She 's actually a year younger than his oldest child ! )

Black men no longer respect black women .Black women are the most disrespected group of women on the face of this earth .They are called derogatory names in music and portrayed in the media as the worst possible stereotypes .It is so bad that Michelle Obama captures America because , even though the majority of us are normal people , the rest of America thinks she is an exception versus the normal .I 'm fed up with black people .As a black man I hope these young black women can learn something from this ! ! ! ! !

We do n't control the media in this country ... we do n't even have a little cable channel that 's truly ours .So , it is what is .Take as a reminder to make sure you are giving your kids values ... and self esteem .It 's only an one hour special ...I thought it was gon na be a reality show .ALM . @Black Angel : Your comment from 12/27 at 9:19 was perfection .Exactly !The tv executives have purposefully decided to show the world this type of image as representative of the Black community , when this situation probably only represents a third of the community .

If it was n't for Shonda Rhimes we 'd never see Black people in diverse roles on tv .We are random side kicks everywhere else on tv .We only exist on tv to assist other racial groups in furthering their lives .That is NOT my reality , and it is NOT the reality of thousands of other Black people that I know personality .That is also NOT the reality of millions of other Black people that I have not met .Tony Smith .You are so right ! ! ! !LXL .Yes , buy Mama Kardashian was married too . stlchick . atl , what you fail to realize is that Bruce and that woman had their children with one spouse , with the benefit of marriage .

Directions .Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Lightly grease2 ( 9-inch ) round cake pans .In a large bowl , combine cake mix and gelatin .Add pureed strawberries , eggs , oil , and water ; beat at medium speed with an electric mixer until smooth .Pour into prepared pans , and bake for 20 minutes , or until a wooden pick inserted in the center comes out clean .Let cool in pans for 10 minutes .Remove from pans , and cool completely on wire racks .For the frosting : .
